News.headline: Tickets ON SALE: Dagenham and Redbridge v Solihull Moors
News.page_title: Tickets ON SALE: Dagenham and Redbridge v Solihull Moors
News.URL_keywords: Tickets ON SALE: Dagenham and Redbridge v Solihull Moors
News.short_description: Tickets for the Daggers home clash against Solihull Moors are now on sale.
News.description:
Solihull Moors visit The Chigwell Construction Stadium on Saturday 17th December, with 3:00pm kick off. 

Ticket prices can be found here. Under-10s are FREE if purchased in advance of matchday with an adult equivalent.

Individual tickets can also be purchased on-line, on the phone and in the club shop.  

Purchase:
Online:www.daggerstickets.co.uk
Phone: 020 8592 1549 ext 21   
Club shop: Opening Times
